basics.label: Information Technology Intern
basics.summary: To obtain a full time in the Entry Level Information Technology Management field where I can utilize my education to contribute to company's operations and learning opportunities where I can maximize my skills, and advanced training development.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Participated in human and technology interaction management with supervisor. Developed an interface between website and databases via Excel that allowed House of Representatives and Senators more effective and easier access to information. Completed several workshops and lectures about the history of the Library of Congress.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Set up and maintained the Computer Aided Real-Time translation (CART) system in classrooms and various locations around campus, when needed. Assisted staff, faculty and students on a daily basis with equipment repairs, customer service, and technology problems. Verified that each classroom had the appropriate equipment and technology needed for success daily.

education.area: Information and Technology Management & American Sign Language

awards.title: Bloomsburg University Career Intensive Boot Camp
